parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A primary verb; properly, to lead; by implication, to bring, drive, go, pass, or induce.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To throw (cast) (upon), as of cares. From epi and rhipto; to throw upon.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A long flowing outer garment, tunic. Neuter of a presumed derivative of ennumi; a dress.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
A colt, young ass, foal. Apparently a primary word; a 'foal' or 'filly', i.e., a young ass.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To place upon (a horse, mule). From epi and a reduplicated derivative of the base of basis; to cause to mount.
